title: Measurement Partner II
content:
About Pinterest:  
Millions of people across the world come to Pinterest to find new ideas every day. It’s where they get inspiration, dream about new possibilities and plan for what matters most. Our mission is to help those people find their inspiration and create a life they love. In your role, you’ll be challenged to take on work that upholds this mission and pushes Pinterest forward. You’ll grow as a person and leader in your field, all the while helping Pinners make their lives better in the positive corner of the internet.
Creating a life you love also means finding a career that celebrates the unique perspectives and experiences that you bring. As you read through the expectations of the position, consider how your skills and experiences may complement the responsibilities of the role. We encourage you to think through your relevant and transferable skills from prior experiences.
Our new progressive work model is called PinFlex, a term that’s uniquely Pinterest to describe our flexible approach to living and working. Visit our PinFlex landing page to learn more. The Measurement Partner team for Brazil is focused on supporting the ads measurement needs of our sellers and advertisers. As a Measurement Partner, you will help a variety of Advertisers to understand user behaviors on Pinterest and measure the effectiveness of their advertising on Pinterest. You’ll design and execute empirical research that will include both analyses for individual clients and to inform the industry as a whole. Your work will also influence Pinterest’s internal measurement product and ad product roadmap. 
What you’ll do:

Help sellers articulate the Pinterest value proposition and handle objections using knowledge of measurement and analytics
Establish a relevant learning agenda with the most strategic clients
Design experiments/tests and deliver studies with 1st party or 3rd party solutions that analyze advertising effectiveness on Pinterest and the relative impact of different tactics 
Work closely with our client teams to deliver data-driven recommendations for future campaigns
Communicate complex results back to non-technical client audience and influence client measurement thinking and media buying decisions
Provide feedback to the Product teams in order to assess opportunities for new features or new partnerships and to improve the existing measurement solutions
Contribute to conducting webinars, writing whitepapers, building thought leadership pieces related to measurement 

What we’re looking for:

Experience in Ads Measurement, Digital Marketing and Adtech
Understanding of various measurement methodologies (attribution modeling, brand lift, conversion lift, econometry...etc.)
Experience manipulating complex datasets to identify patterns and turn them into learnings
Experience in client-facing roles involving technical and business stakeholders
Fluent in  English
Strong interpersonal skills 
Entrepreneur/Builder mindset
Team player able to collaborate with other functions such as product teams, marketing and PR

 
This position is not eligible for relocation assistance.

To build an app that’s used and loved by people all around the world, we need a team with all kinds of different perspectives, experiences and backgrounds.
